alert.note: Alert for Cannon; De Kalb; Jackson; Putnam; Rutherford; Smith; Warren; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 12:26PM CDT until August 12 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Smith County in Middle Tennessee... De Kalb County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Jackson County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Warren County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... Cannon County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1226 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hartsville to Woodbury to Murfreesboro, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, McMinnville, Smithville, Woodbury, Carthage, Watertown, Baxter, Gordonsville, Walterhill, Hickman, South Carthage, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Centertown, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Center Hill Lake, Bradyville and Readyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 241 and 278. Interstate 24 between mile markers 80 and 89. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; De Kalb; Jackson; Putnam; Rutherford; Smith; Warren; Wilson
